certifications: American Chemistry Council Responsible Care Program
equipment_features: Full safety lane inspection at Memphis terminal
carrier_master.industry_role: Tim Gatlin = Tennessee Trucking Association Board of Directors
carrier_master.driver_satisfaction_notes: Above-average pay (+$0.05/mi vs national avg), family atmosphere, no-touch freight, premium equipment. Complaints: only 1 terminal, camera rollout concerns.
sentiment_top_complaints: Hazmat drivers need secure overnight parking
carrier_master.fit_rationale: 15 miles from West Memphis hub. 35-45% hazmat = highest security parking need. Only 1 terminal = massive gap. Donnie Caldwell (Ozark COO) warm intro. Tim Gatlin = TTA Board Director. 'Treat People Right' philosophy aligns perfectly.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: 'Treat People Right' — we built a place that does exactly that
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: Hazmat drivers need secure overnight parking — gated, camera-monitored, 24/7
carrier_master.recommended_entry_persona: Tim Gatlin (CEO) via Donnie Caldwell warm intro
carrier_master.warm_intro_path: Donnie Caldwell (Ozark COO) → Tim Gatlin (Empire CEO). Close Ozark first, then Caldwell introduces.
carrier_master.strategic_multiplier: Empire + Mid South + Ozark = 3 Memphis carriers at LHS.
carrier_master.exec_summary: Empire Express is a family-owned Memphis carrier (15 mi from hub) with 201-500 trucks, 35-45% hazmat. Founded 1985 by Ed 'Big Ed' Gatlin. CEO Tim Gatlin (TTA Board). Only 1 terminal. Warm intro via Ozark's Caldwell. 'Treat People Right' culture = perfect Outriders Club alignment.

carrier_contacts.title: President & CEO
carrier_contacts.notes: PRIMARY. TTA Board Director. Warm intro via Caldwell.
